body.raw: {"charset":"UTF-8","secretBaseEncoding":"NONE","baseEncoding":"BASE64","method":"HMAC_OUTBOUND_SIGNATURE_CALCULATION","secretType":"SCRIPT","name":"Payone Payment Hamc_export","secret":"${vars.apiSecret}","source":"<#assign result = \"POST\\n\"+vars.definedContextType+\"\\n\" + auth.hmac.hmacFields.date + \"\\nx-gcs-idempotence-key:\"+input.idempotencyKey+\"\\n/\" + vars.apiVersion + \"/\" + input.merchantId + \"/payments\\n\">\n${result}","id":775,"isHmacSignature":true,"hmacFields":{"date":"<#setting locale=\"en_US\"><#setting time_zone=\"GMT\">${.now?string(\"EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss 'GMT'\")}"},"algorithm":"HmacSHA256"}

{"charset":"UTF-8","secretBaseEncoding":"NONE","baseEncoding":"BASE64","method":"HMAC_OUTBOUND_SIGNATURE_CALCULATION","secretType":"SCRIPT","name":"Payone cancel Hmac_export","secret":"${vars.apiSecret}","source":"<#assign result = \"POST\\n\"+vars.definedContextType+\"\\n\" + auth.hmac.hmacFields.date + \"\\nx-gcs-idempotence-key:\"+input.idempotencyKey+\"\\n/\" + vars.apiVersion + \"/\" + input.merchantId + \"/payments/\"+input.authorizationPspReference+\"/cancel\\n\">\n${result}","id":776,"isHmacSignature":true,"hmacFields":{"date":"<#setting locale=\"en_US\"><#setting time_zone=\"GMT\">${.now?string(\"EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss 'GMT'\")}"},"algorithm":"HmacSHA256"}
